stratagems.whenBody: Any phase, just after a T'au Empire Battlesuit model from your army is destroyed.
stratagems.targetBody: That destroyed model's unit. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even if that unit was just destroyed.
stratagems.effectBody: Before removing your model from play, if it has the Deadly Demise ability, do not roll for that ability; instead, you can choose whether the result of that roll is a 1 or a 6. If your model does not have the Deadly Demise ability, roll one D6 for each unit within 6" of it: on a 4+, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Regiment or Squadron unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: After your unit has resolved its attacks, select one enemy unit that was targeted by one or more of those attacks. Until the end of the phase, each time an attack is made against that enemy unit by a Regiment or Squadron model from your army, unless the attacking unit is Battle-shocked, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
stratagems.targetBody: One Heretic Astartes Infantry or Heretic Astartes Mounted unit from your army (excluding Damned units) that is within 9" of that enemy unit and not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
stratagems.effectBody: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to 6".

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
stratagems.targetBody: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that is within 9" of that enemy unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to 6".
stratagems.restrictionBody: You cannot select a unit that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.

stratagems.whenBody: Any phase, just after an enemy Psyker unit has either finished using a Psychic ability that targets a unit, or finished making Psychic Attacks.
stratagems.targetBody: One Anathema Psykana unit from your army within 18" of that enemy Psyker unit.
stratagems.effectBody: That enemy Psyker unit must take a Leadership test. If the test is passed, that Psyker unit is Battle‑shocked; if the test is failed that Psyker unit suffers 3 mortal wounds and is Battle‑shocked.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Command phase.
stratagems.targetBody: Up to two Endless Multitude units from your army that are within Synapse Range of your army, or one other Endless Multitude unit from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: You can return up to D3+3 destroyed models to each of those selected units.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Movement phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Tyranids unit from your army that is in Reserves, or up to two Vanguard Invader units from your army that are in Reserves.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, for the purposes of setting up those selected units on the battlefield, treat the current battle round number as being one higher than it actually is.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One Heretic Astartes unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks, and one friendly Damned unit within 3" of your unit and visible to both your unit and the attacking unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, while your Damned unit is on the battlefield, each time your opponent would make a Wound roll for an attack that targets your Heretic Astartes unit, if your Damned unit is visible to the attacking model and is an eligible target for that attack, no roll is made; instead, your Damned unit suffers a number of mortal wounds equal to the Damage characteristic of that attack.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One Boyz unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: After the attacking unit has shot, your unit can make a Go Get 'Em! move. To do so, roll one D6: each model in your unit can move a distance in inches up to the result, but your unit must end that move as close as possible to the closest enemy unit. When doing so, those models can be moved within Engagement Range of that enemy unit. If your unit contains 10 or more models, you can re-roll the D6 to determine how far your unit can move.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Genestealer Cults units from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, a Critical Hit is scored on an unmodified Hit roll of 5+, instead of only a 6.

stratagems.whenBody: Any phase, just after an enemy unit ends a move within 9" of one or more of your Cult Ambush markers.
stratagems.targetBody: One Astra Militarum Vehicle unit from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Select one of those Cult Ambush markers. You can set up that Cult Ambush marker anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 9" horizontally away from all enemy units and wholly within 6" of your unit.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One Legiones Daemonica unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of that enemy unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time an invulnerable saving throw is made for a model in your unit, re-roll a saving throw of 1.

stratagems.whenBody: Start of your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Cryptek model from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Select one objective marker within 18" of your Cryptek model. Until the end of the phase, weapons equipped by friendly Necrons models have the [IGNORES COVER] ability while targeting units within range of that objective marker.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Movement phase, just after an Adeptus Astartes unit from your army makes a Fall Back or Advance move.
stratagems.targetBody: That Adeptus Astartes unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot even though it Fell Back or Advanced this phase. If the Saga of the Warrior Born has been completed by your army, until the end of the turn, your unit is also eligible to declare a charge.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Command phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Legio Cybernetica or Adeptus Mechanicus Vehicle unit from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back and you can ignore any or all modifiers to its characteristics and/or to any roll or test made for it (excluding modifiers to saving throws).

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Thousand Sons Psyker unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a Psychic Attack, you can re-roll the Hit roll and you can re-roll the Wound roll.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit destroys a Necrons unit from your army.
stratagems.targetBody: One Necrons Character unit from your army that was within 6" of that Necrons unit when it was destroyed.
stratagems.effectBody: After the attacking unit has resolved its attacks, your unit can shoot as if it were your Shooting phase, but it must target only that enemy unit when doing so, and can only do so if that enemy unit is an eligible target.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Fall Back move.
stratagems.targetBody: One Beast Snagga Infantry or Beast Snagga Mounted unit from your army that was within Engagement Range of that enemy unit at the start of the phase.
stratagems.effectBody: If your unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, it can make a Normal move of up to 6".

stratagems.whenBody: Start of your opponent's Charge phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Heretic Astartes unit from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time an enemy unit selects your unit as a target of a charge, subtract 2 from the Charge roll (this is not cumulative with any other negative modifiers to that Charge roll).

stratagems.whenBody: Your Movement phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One World Eaters unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, if your unit Advances, do not make an Advance roll for it. Instead, until the end of the phase, add 6" to the Move characteristic of models in your unit.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Cult Mechanicus unit from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Roll one D6 for each enemy unit within 6" of one or more Cult Mechanicus models in your unit, adding 1 to the result if that model is an Electro-Priest. On a 5+, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Adepta Sororitas unit from your army that disembarked from a Transport this turn and has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack that targets an enemy unit within 12" that is also within range of an objective marker, add 1 to the Wound roll. If one or more enemy models are destroyed as the result of those attacks, select one of those destroyed models; that destroyed model's unit must take a Battle-shock test.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Command phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Lychguard or Triarch unit from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the start of your next Command phase, add 1 to the Objective Control characteristic of models in your unit. If your unit has the Vehicle keyword, add 3 to the Objective Control characteristic instead.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Speed Freeks unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability and, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets a unit within 9", a Critical Hit is scored on an unmodified Hit roll of 5+, instead of only a 6.
stratagems.restrictionBody: A unit cannot be targeted by this and the Dakkastorm Stratagem in the same phase.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Movement phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Heretic Astartes Infantry unit or Heretic Astartes Mounted unit from your army (excluding Damned units).
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Advanced or Fell Back, and bolt pistols, boltguns and combi-bolters equipped by models in your unit have the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability while your unit has not already inflicted 6 wounds this turn using that ability.

stratagems.whenBody: Command phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that is below its Starting Strength.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the turn, your unit can ignore any or all modifiers to its characteristics and/or to any roll or test made for it (excluding modifiers to saving throws).

stratagems.whenBody: Your Charge phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Aberrants, Biophagus or Purestrain Genestealers unit from your army that has not declared a charge this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time your unit declares a charge, if the closest eligible enemy unit is selected as one of the targets of that charge, add 1 to the Charge roll for each selected target of that charge (including the closest eligible enemy unit), to a maximum of +3.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Penitent unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a Penitent model in your unit makes a melee attack, a successful unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets a unit that is below its Starting Strength, that attack has the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability, and when making such an attack, if the attacking model is a Vehicle, a successful unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Heretic Astartes unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets a unit within range of an objective marker, that attack has the [PRECISION] ability.

stratagems.whenBody: Any phase, just after an enemy unit ends a move within 9" of one or more of your Cult Ambush markers.
stratagems.targetBody: One Atalan Jackals unit from your army in Cult Ambush.
stratagems.effectBody: Select one of those Cult Ambush markers. You can set up that Cult Ambush marker anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 9" horizontally away from all enemy units and wholly within 6" of one or more battlefield edges. Until the end of the battle, you can only select Atalan Jackals units from your army to set up using that Cult Ambush marker.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One T'au Empire Battlesuit unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 6+ ability.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has resolved its attacks.
stratagems.targetBody: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that had one or more of its models destroyed as a result of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Your unit can shoot as if it were your Shooting phase, but must target only that enemy unit when doing so, and can only do so if that enemy unit is an eligible target.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Movement phase, just after an Orks Walker unit from your army has been selected to Advance.
stratagems.targetBody: That Orks Walker unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the turn, you can re‑roll Advance rolls made for your unit and ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [ASSAULT] ability.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One Nobz or Meganobz unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

stratagems.whenBody: Command phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Synapse unit from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the turn, while a friendly Tyranids unit is within 9" of the selected unit, that unit is within Synapse Range of your army.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

stratagems.whenBody: Any phase, just after an enemy unit fails a Battle-shock test.
stratagems.targetBody: One Synapse unit from your army within 12" of that enemy unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Roll six D6: for each 3+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One Adeptus Custodes Infantry unit from your army (excluding Anathema Psykana units) that is within range of an objective marker you control and that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a melee attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Adeptus Astartes Infantry unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets the closest eligible target within 6", add 1 to the Wound roll.

stratagems.whenBody: Command phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Harvester unit from your army that is within range of an objective marker you control.
stratagems.effectBody: That objective marker remains under your control, even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Movement phase, just after a Heretic Astartes Infantry unit from your army Falls Back.
stratagems.targetBody: That Heretic Astartes Infantry unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.

stratagems.whenBody: Start of your Movement phase.
stratagems.targetBody: Up to two Adeptus Custodes units from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the turn, your units are eligible to shoot and/or declare a charge in a turn in which they Fell Back.
stratagems.restrictionBody: You can only select two units if one (and only one) of them is an Anathema Psykana unit and both are within 6" of each other.

stratagems.whenBody: End of your opponent's Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Stealth, Ghostkeel or Commander Shadowsun unit from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Remove your unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves.
stratagems.restrictionBody: You cannot target a unit that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Leagues of Votann unit from your army, and one enemy unit that has one or more Judgement tokens and is within Engagement Range of that Leagues of Votann unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a melee attack that targets that enemy unit, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1 for each Judgement token that enemy unit has.

stratagems.whenBody: Any phase, just after an Adepta Sororitas unit from your army suffers a mortal wound.
stratagems.targetBody: That Adepta Sororitas unit, or one friendly Adepta Sororitas Jump Pack unit within 3" of it.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability against mortal wounds. If you targeted an Adepta Sororitas Jump Pack unit from your army with this Stratagem, then until the end of the phase, while a friendly Adepta Sororitas unit is unit is within 3" of your unit, models in that unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability against mortal wounds.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Movement phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Adeptus Astartes Mounted or Adeptus Astartes Vehicle unit (excluding Walkers) from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, if your unit Advances, do not make an Advance roll for it. Instead, until the end of the phase, add 6" to the Move characteristic of models in your unit, or 9" instead if your unit is Mounted.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One Penitent unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, Penitent models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 4+ ability.

stratagems.whenBody: End of the Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Adeptus Astartes Transport unit from your army that has no models embarked within it, and one Adeptus Astartes Infantry unit from your army wholly within 6" of that Transport.
stratagems.effectBody: Your Infantry unit can embark within that Transport.
stratagems.restrictionBody: You cannot target an Infantry unit that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, that cannot normally embark within that Transport, or that disembarked from a Transport this turn.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One Speed Freeks or Trukk unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have a 5+ invulnerable save. If your unit is a Vehicle unit with an unmodified Toughness characteristic of 8 or less, until the end of the phase, models in your unit have a 4+ invulnerable save instead.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Destroyer Cult or Flayed Ones unit from your army that has just destroyed an enemy unit, or just caused an enemy unit that was not Below Half-strength to become Below Half-strength.
stratagems.effectBody: Your unit's Reanimation Protocols activate.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Movement phase or your Charge phase.
stratagems.targetBody: Up to two War Dog models from your army or one Titanic Chaos Knights model from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, the selected models can move horizontally through models and terrain features as if they were not there.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One Sicarian, Pteraxii or Sydonian unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Tyranids unit from your army that just destroyed an enemy unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Your unit immediately Regenerates (See Feed the Swarm). When doing so, if your unit is a Harvester unit and you choose for one model to regain up to D3 lost wounds, that model regains up to 3 lost wounds instead.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Command phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Legio Cybernetica or Adeptus Mechanicus Vehicle unit from your army, and one objective marker.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the start of your next Command phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have a Ballistic Skill characteristic of 3+ and the [IGNORES COVER] ability, but they can only target units within range of the selected objective marker.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Command phase.
stratagems.targetBody: Your Necrons Warlord.
stratagems.effectBody: For each of your Necrons units in Reserves, that Reserves unit's Reanimation Protocols activate.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Grey Knights Psyker unit from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit with the [PSYCHIC] ability also have the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Fall Back move.
stratagems.targetBody: One Destroyer Cult or Flayed Ones unit from your army that started the phase within Engagement Range of that enemy unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Roll one D6: on a 2-5, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds; on a 6, that enemy unit suffers 3 mortal wounds. Your unit can then make a Normal move, but must end that move as close as possible to that enemy unit.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Movement phase, just after a Leagues of Votann unit from your army Falls Back.
stratagems.targetBody: That Leagues of Votann unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, do not remove it from play. The destroyed model can fight after the attacking model's unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One Tyranids unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6: on a 4+, do not remove it from play. The destroyed model can fight after the attacking model's unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

stratagems.whenBody: Any phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Necrons Infantry Character model from your army that was just destroyed. You can use this Stratagem on that model even though it was just destroyed.
stratagems.effectBody: At the end of the phase, set your model back up on the battlefield as close as possible to where it was destroyed and not within Engagement Range of any enemy units, with half of its starting number of wounds remaining.
stratagems.restrictionBody: Each model can only be targeted with this Stratagem once per battle.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [LANCE] ability. If your unit is under the effects of the Assault Doctrine, until the end of the phase, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of such weapons by 1 as well.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has shot or fought.
stratagems.targetBody: One Cryptek model from your army that was destroyed by one of the attacking unit's attacks. You can use this Stratagem on that model even though it was just destroyed.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the battle, each time a friendly Canoptek model makes an attack that targets the attacking unit, add 1 to the Hit roll and add 1 to the Wound roll.

stratagems.whenBody: End of your opponent's Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Beast Snagga unit from your army that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Remove your unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One World Eaters unit from your army that made a Charge move this turn and destroyed one or more enemy units this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: In your opponent's next Command phase, each enemy unit within 6" of your unit must take a Battle-shock test. If the unit taking that test is Below Half-strength, subtract 1 from that test. Enemy units affected by this Stratagem do not need to take any other Battle-shock tests in the same phase.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Command phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Imperial Knights model from your army that has lost one or more wounds.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the start of your next Command phase, improve your model's Move, Toughness, Save, Leadership and Objective Control characteristics by 1 and each time your model makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll.
stratagems.restrictionBody: You can only use this Stratagem once per battle. If your army is Honoured, you can use this Stratagem one additional time.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Imperial Knights model from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase, and one enemy Monster or Vehicle unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time your model makes an attack that targets that enemy unit, add 1 to the Wound roll. If your model destroys that enemy unit this phase, you gain 1CP, but if your model does not destroy that enemy unit this phase, you cannot use this Stratagem again for the rest of the battle.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability against mortal wounds and Psychic Attacks. If the Saga of the Bear has been completed by your army, until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 4+ ability against mortal wounds and Psychic Attacks instead.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Command phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Legio Cybernetica or Adeptus Mechanicus Vehicle unit from your army that is below its Starting Strength.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the start of your next Command phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, you can re-roll the Hit roll. If your unit is Below Half-strength, you can re-roll the Wound roll as well.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One Death Guard unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of that enemy unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, your unit has the Stealth ability.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Heretic Astartes Daemon Vehicle unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, if your unit invokes its contract, each time it makes an attack, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

stratagems.whenBody: Any phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Adeptus Custodes Character unit from your army that has just destroyed the unit you selected at the start of your Command phase as the target of your Assemblage of Might ability.
stratagems.effectBody: Select one enemy unit on the battlefield. Until the start of your next Command phase, each time an Adeptus Custodes Character model from your army makes an attack that target that enemy unit, add 1 to the Wound roll. In addition, if the destroyed unit was a Character unit, gain 1CP.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One Imperial Knights model from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, that Imperial Knights model has a 4+ invulnerable save against ranged attacks.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability. If your unit Remained Stationary this turn, then until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack, a successful unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Movement phase, just after an Adeptus Astartes unit from your army Falls Back.
stratagems.targetBody: That Adeptus Astartes unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.

stratagems.whenBody: Start of your Movement phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Cult Mechanicus unit from your army and one enemy unit within 18" of it.
stratagems.effectBody: That enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test. If that test is failed, until the start of your next Command phase, each time a model in that enemy unit makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

stratagems.whenBody: Start of any Command phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Legiones Daemonica unit from your army that is within range of an objective marker you control.
stratagems.effectBody: That objective marker is said to be Corrupted and remains under your control, even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn. In addition, while an objective marker is Corrupted and under your control, the area of the battlefield within 6" of that objective marker is considered to be within your army's Shadow of Chaos.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

stratagems.whenBody: The start of your Shooting phase or the start of the Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: Two Genestealer Cults units from your army that have not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Select one enemy unit (if this Stratagem is used in the Fight phase, that enemy unit must be within Engagement Range of both of your units). Until the end of the phase, each time a model in either of your units makes an attack, it can only target that enemy unit (and only if it is an eligible target for that attack), and when resolving that attack, add 1 to the Wound roll.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Movement phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Necrons unit from your army (excluding Monster units) that is arriving using the Deep Strike or Hyperphasing abilities this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Your unit can be set up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 3" horizontally away from all enemy models.
stratagems.restrictionBody: A unit targeted with this Stratagem is not eligible to declare a charge in the same turn.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Astra Militarum unit from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of one or more Genestealer Cults units from your army. Until the end of the phase, your unit can make ranged attacks that target that enemy unit. If it does, after it has resolved those attacks, roll one D6 for each of those Genestealer Cults units: on a 5+, the unit being rolled for suffers D3+1 mortal wounds.

stratagems.whenBody: Any phase, just after a mortal wound has been allocated to an Adeptus Custodes model from your army (excluding Anathema Psykana models).
stratagems.targetBody: That Adeptus Custodes model's unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 4+ ability against mortal wounds.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
stratagems.targetBody: Up to two Vanguard Invader units from your army that are within 9" of that enemy unit, or one other Tyranids Infantry unit from your army that is within 9" of that enemy unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Those selected units can each make a Normal move of up to 6".
stratagems.restrictionBody: You cannot target units that are within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Movement phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Aeldari unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, if your unit Advances, do not make an Advance roll for it. Instead, until the end of the phase, add 6" to the Move characteristic of models in your unit.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One Haemonculus Covens unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Heretic Astartes Chaos Undivided unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, you can re-roll the Wound roll.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has resolved its attacks.
stratagems.targetBody: One Adeptus Astartes Transport unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: One unit embarked within that Transport can disembark as if it were your Movement phase, and can then shoot as if it were your Shooting phase, but must target only that enemy unit when doing so, and can only do so if that enemy unit is an eligible target.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
stratagems.targetBody: One Drukhari Transport from your army that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units and is within 9" of the enemy unit that just ended that move.
stratagems.effectBody: Your Transport can make a Normal move of up to 6".

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has shot.
stratagems.targetBody: One Penitent unit from your army that was selected as the target as one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Roll one D6: your unit can be moved a distance in inches up to the result, but it must end that move as close as possible to the closest enemy unit (excluding Aircraft). When doing so, models in your unit can be moved within Engagement Range of enemy units.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One T'au Empire Infantry unit from your army that disembarked from a Transport this turn.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets the closest enemy unit, you can re-roll the Wound roll.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Command phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Death Guard model from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Your model regains up to D3 lost wounds. If your model's unit is within Contagion Range of an Infected objective marker you control, your model regains up to 3 lost wounds instead.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Vanguard Invader Infantry unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [PRECISION] ability.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Adeptus Custodes unit from your army (excluding Anathema Psykana units) that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Select either the [LETHAL HITS] or [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability. Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the selected ability.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Movement phase, just after an Adepta Sororitas unit from your army Falls Back.
stratagems.targetBody: That Adepta Sororitas unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot or declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back. If your unit has the Penitent keyword, it is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back instead.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One T'au Empire Battlesuit unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets an enemy unit that contains 6 or more models, that attack has the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability. If that attack targets an enemy unit that contains 11 or more models, it has the [SUSTAINED HITS 2] ability instead.

stratagems.whenBody: End of your opponent's Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Genestealer Cults Mounted or Genestealer Cults Vehicle unit from your army that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units and is wholly within 9" of one or more battlefield edges.
stratagems.effectBody: Remove your unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Charge phase, just after an enemy unit declares a charge.
stratagems.targetBody: One Genestealer Cults Infantry unit from your army that was selected as a target of that charge.
stratagems.effectBody: Roll one D6: on a 2-4, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds; on a 5+, that enemy unit suffers 3 mortal wounds.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Charge phase, just after an enemy unit has declared a charge.
stratagems.targetBody: One Canoptek unit from your army that was selected as a target of that charge and is wholly within your army's Power Matrix.
stratagems.effectBody: Your unit's Reanimation Protocols activate.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Command phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Heretic Astartes Vehicle unit from your army (excluding Daemon units).
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the battle, your unit has the Daemon keyword.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has shot.
stratagems.targetBody: One Genestealer Cults Infantry unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Remove your unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One Orks unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, do not remove it from play. The destroyed model can fight after the attacking unit has finished making attacks, and is then removed from play.

stratagems.whenBody: End of the Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
stratagems.effectBody: Your unit can immediately make a Fall Back move of up to 6".
stratagems.restrictionBody: When making that move, your unit must end that move either wholly within your deployment zone or within range of an objective marker.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Charge phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Skitarii unit from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, your unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced.

stratagems.whenBody: The start of your Shooting phase or the start of the Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Cryptek or Canoptek unit from your army that is wholly within your army's Power Matrix.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, weapons equipped by Cryptek or Canoptek models in your unit have the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack that targets a Monster or Vehicle unit, you can re-roll the Wound roll.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Speed Freeks unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability. While targeting a unit within 9", they have the [SUSTAINED HITS 2] ability instead.
stratagems.restrictionBody: A unit cannot be targeted by this and the Blitza Fire Stratagem in the same phase.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Movement phase, just before a Penitent unit from your army Advances.
stratagems.targetBody: That Penitent unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced. If your unit has the Penitent Engines keyword, do not make an Advance roll for it; instead, until the end of the phase, add 6" to the Move characteristic of models in your unit.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Movement phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Endless Multitude unit from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time your unit Advances, do not make an Advance roll. Instead, until the end of the phase, add 6" to the Move characteristic of models in your unit.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit that has one or more Judgement tokens has resolved its attacks.
stratagems.targetBody: One Leagues of Votann unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Your Leagues of Votann unit can shoot as if it were your Shooting phase, but it must target the enemy unit that just attacked it, and can only do so if that enemy unit is an eligible target.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
stratagems.targetBody: One Speed Freeks unit from your army that is within 9" of that enemy unit and is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
stratagems.effectBody: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to 6".

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Movement phase, when an enemy unit (excluding Vehicles and Monsters) is selected to Fall Back.
stratagems.targetBody: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of that enemy unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Roll one D6, adding 1 to the result if the Accept Any Challenge, No Matter the Odds vow is active for your army. On a 4+, that enemy unit cannot Fall Back this phase and must Remain Stationary. Otherwise, that enemy unit can Fall Back this phase, but if it does, all models in that unit must take a Desperate Escape test.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Command phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Tech-Priest model from your army and one objective marker within 24" of that model (excluding your Acquisition objective marker).
stratagems.effectBody: Until the start of your next Command phase, that objective marker is also considered to be one of your Acquisition objective markers for all rules purposes.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has shot.
stratagems.targetBody: One Destroyer Cult or Flayed Ones unit from your army that had one or more of its models destroyed by the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Your unit can make a Normal move, but must end that move as close as possible to that enemy unit.

stratagems.whenBody: Start of the Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Adeptus Custodes unit from your army (excluding Anathema Psykana units) that is below its Starting Strength.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons equipped by models in your unit. If your unit is Below Half-strength, until the end of the phase, add 2 to the Attacks characteristic of those melee weapons instead.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Necrons unit from your army (excluding Titanic units) that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, an unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Synapse unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase, and one enemy unit within 24" of and visible to the Synapse unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a friendly Tyranids model makes an attack that targets that enemy unit, if the attacking model's unit is within 6" of your Synapse unit, re-roll a Hit roll of 1 and re-roll a Wound roll of 1.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One Harvester unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability. If your unit is within range of an objective marker you control, until the end of the phase models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 4+ ability instead.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Movement phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One T'au Empire unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, if your unit Advances, do not make an Advance roll for it. Instead, until the end of the phase, add 6" to the Move characteristic of models in your unit.

stratagems.whenBody: Any phase, when a Tyranids unit from your army is destroyed, before the last model in it is removed from play.
stratagems.targetBody: One Harvester unit from your army that is within 6" of that destroyed unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Regenerate one friendly Tyranids unit within 6" of your Harvester unit (See Feed the Swarm).

stratagems.whenBody: Your Charge phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Adeptus Astartes Mounted unit from your army that has not declared a charge this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the turn, you can re-roll Charge rolls made for your unit and melee weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [LANCE] ability.

stratagems.whenBody: End of your opponent's Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: Up to two Phobos and/or Scout Squad units from your army, or one other Adeptus Astartes Infantry unit from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Remove those units from the battlefield and place them into Strategic Reserves.
stratagems.restrictionBody: Each unit selected for this Stratagem must be more than 3" away from all enemy models.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has resolved its attacks.
stratagems.targetBody: One Adeptus Astartes Vehicle unit from your army that was reduced to Below Half-strength as a result of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Your unit can shoot as if it were your Shooting phase, but must target only that enemy unit when doing so, and can only do so if that enemy unit is an eligible target.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One Anathema Psykana Infantry unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, your unit has the Stealth ability, and Battle‑shocked and Psyker models can only select your unit as a target of a ranged attack if they are within 12".

stratagems.whenBody: Your Command phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Tyranids unit from your army that is within Synapse Range of your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Select one Synaptic Imperative, even if you have already selected that imperative this battle. Until the start of your next Command phase, that Synaptic Imperative is active for your unit instead of any other Synaptic Imperative that is active for your army.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Cult Mechanicus unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a Cult Mechanicus model in your unit makes a melee attack, add 1 to the Wound roll.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Thousand Sons Psyker unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, all inferno bolt pistols, inferno boltguns, inferno combi-bolters and inferno combi-weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [PSYCHIC] ability and a Strength characteristic of 5.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Heretic Astartes Infantry unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets a unit that is Battle-shocked and/or Below Half-strength, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Heretic Astartes Daemon Vehicle unit from your army (excluding Titanic units) that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, if your unit invokes its contract, each time it makes an attack that destroys an enemy model, roll one D6: on a 5+, your unit regains 1 lost wound after all of its attacks have been resolved (to a maximum of 6 wounds).

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One Adeptus Mechanicus unit from your army (excluding Vehicle units) that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks. If that unit is Battleline, you can also target one friendly Skitarii unit (excluding Battleline units) within 6" of it.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets one of those units from your army, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

stratagems.whenBody: Any phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Adepta Sororitas Character unit from your army that was just destroyed. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even though it was just destroyed.
stratagems.effectBody: Discard 1-3 Miracle dice. At the end of the phase, set the last destroyed model from your unit back up on the battlefield, as close as possible to where it was destroyed and not within Engagement Range of any enemy models. Roll one D3, adding 1 to the result for each Miracle dice you discarded. That model is set back up with that number of wounds remaining (up to its starting number of wounds).
stratagems.restrictionBody: You cannot select Saint Celestine as the target of this Stratagem. You cannot select the same Character as the target of this Stratagem more than once per battle.

stratagems.whenBody: End of your opponent's turn.
stratagems.targetBody: Up to two Legiones Daemonica units from your army that are within your army's Shadow of Chaos, or one other Legiones Daemonica unit from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Remove the targeted units from the battlefield and place them into Strategic Reserves. They will arrive back on the battlefield in the Reinforcements step of your next Movement phase using the Deep Strike ability.
stratagems.restrictionBody: You cannot target units that are within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units with this Stratagem.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One Heretic Astartes unit from your army (excluding Damned units) that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One Adeptus Mechanicus Infantry unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks, and one friendly Adeptus Mechanicus Smoke unit within 6" of it.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, both of those units have the Stealth ability and the Benefit of Cover.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Death Guard unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability. While your unit is within range of an Infected objective marker you control, those weapons have the [SUSTAINED HITS 2] ability instead.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Movement phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Deathwing unit from your army that is arriving using the Deep Strike ability this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Your unit can be set up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 3" horizontally away from all enemy models.
stratagems.restrictionBody: Until the end of the turn, your unit is not eligible to declare a charge.

stratagems.whenBody: The start of your Shooting phase or the start of the Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: Two Skitarii units from your army that have not been selected to shoot or fight this phase, and one enemy unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of weapons equipped by models in both of your units by 1.
stratagems.restrictionBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in either of your units makes an attack, it can only target that enemy unit (and only if it is an eligible target).

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit destroys a Genestealer Cults Character model from your army.
stratagems.targetBody: One other Genestealer Cults Character model from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the battle, each time a friendly Acolyte Hybrids, Hybrid Metamorphs or Neophyte Hybrids model makes an attack that targets that enemy unit, re-roll a Hit roll of 1. If the destroyed model was a Magus, Primus or Acolyte Iconward, you can re-roll the Hit roll instead.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Kroot unit from your army that destroyed one or more enemy units this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: In your opponent's next Command phase, each enemy unit within 6" of your unit must take a Battle-shock test. If the unit taking that test is Below Half-strength, subtract 1 from that test. Enemy units affected by this Stratagem do not need to take any other Battle-shock tests in the same phase.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Movement phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Heretic Astartes Transport or Heretic Astartes Mounted unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, if your unit Advances, do not make an Advance roll for it. Instead, until the end of the phase, add 6" to the Move characteristic of models in your unit.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One Heretic Astartes unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6, adding 1 to the result if it is a Khorne unit: on a 4+, do not remove it from play. That destroyed model can fight after the attacking model's unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Witchseekers unit from your army that  has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of Torrent weapons equipped by models in your unit. If such a weapon targets a Psyker or Battle‑shocked unit this phase, add 2 to its Attacks characteristic instead.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Command phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Astra Militarum Officer unit from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Your Officer can issue one Order as if it were your Command phase.
stratagems.restrictionBody: Your Officer cannot issue that Order to a Battle-shocked unit.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One Astra Militarum Vehicle unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack is allocated to your unit, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Heretic Astartes unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets a unit that is below its Starting Strength, you can re-roll the Hit roll. If the target is Below Half-strength, you can re-roll the Wound roll as well.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Destroyer Cult or Flayed Ones unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model from your unit makes an attack that targets a unit below Starting Strength, add 1 to the Hit roll. If the target is Below Half-strength, add 1 to the Wound roll as well

stratagems.whenBody: Your Command phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Legio Cybernetica or Adeptus Mechanicus Vehicle unit from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the start of your next Command phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 6+ ability, which is improved to Feel No Pain 5+ against mortal wounds.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One Death Guard unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of that enemy unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack is allocated to a model in your unit, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Movement phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Tyranids unit from your army that is within Synapse Range of your army and made a Fall Back move this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge this turn.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase, just after an Astra Militarum unit from your army has shot.
stratagems.targetBody: That Astra Militarum unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks. Until the end of the turn, that enemy unit cannot be targeted with the Fire Overwatch Stratagem and each time a Genestealer Cults unit from your army selects that enemy unit as a target of a charge, you can re-roll the Charge roll.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
stratagems.targetBody: One Canoptek unit from your army that is within 9" of that enemy unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to 6".

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Heretic Astartes unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more attacks this phase and has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, you can re-roll the Hit roll, and if your unit is Below Half-strength you can re-roll the Wound roll as well.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Acolyte Hybrids, Hybrid Metamorphs or Neophyte Hybrids unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, improve the Attacks and Weapon Skill characteristics of melee weapons equipped by models (excluding Characters) in your unit by 1 and those weapons have the [HAZARDOUS] ability.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Movement phase, just after an Aeldari unit from your army makes a Fall Back move.
stratagems.targetBody: That Aeldari unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge this turn even though it Fell Back.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Adepta Sororitas unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, Torrent weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One Adepta Sororitas unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks, or one friendly Adepta Sororitas Jump Pack unit within 3" of such a unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll. If you targeted an Adepta Sororitas Jump Pack unit from your army with this Stratagem, then until the end of the phase, while a friendly Adepta Sororitas unit is unit is within 3" of your unit, each time an attack targets that unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Adepta Sororitas unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1. If one or more enemy models are destroyed as the result of any of those attacks, you gain 1 Miracle dice.

stratagems.whenBody: End of your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Aeldari unit from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Your unit can make a Normal move. It cannot embark within a Transport at the end of this move.
stratagems.restrictionBody: You cannot select an Aircraft unit or a unit within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, and until the end of the turn, the unit you selected is not eligible to declare a charge.

stratagems.whenBody: Any phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One Thousand Sons unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, all attacks made against your unit with Psychic weapons have the [HAZARDOUS] ability and all models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 4+ ability against Psychic Attacks.

stratagems.whenBody: End of your Command phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Mob unit from your army that contains 10 or more models and is not Below Half‑strength.
stratagems.effectBody: Select one friendly Battle‑shocked Orks Infantry unit within 6" of that Mob unit. That Orks Infantry unit is no longer Battle‑shocked.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Movement phase, before the Reinforcements step.
stratagems.targetBody: One Adeptus Custodes Character model from your army that is not leading a unit.
stratagems.effectBody: Select one friendly unit (excluding Battle-shocked and Attached units) within 2" horizontally and 5" vertically of your model that it could lead (as described in the Leader section of its datasheet). Your model attaches to that unit as a Leader. Change that unit's Starting Strength accordingly.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a melee attack, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1. If the Suffer Not The Unclean to Live vow is active for your army, add 1 to the Strength characteristic of that attack as well.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Mek, Orks Walker or Grots Vehicle unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Each time you use this Stratagem, you can choose to push it. Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets a Monster or Vehicle, add 1 to the Wound roll. If you chose to push it, add 1 to the Damage characteristic of that attack and, until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [HAZARDOUS] ability as well.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One Grey Knights unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of that enemy unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One Beast Snagga Infantry or Beast Snagga Mounted unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a ranged attack targets your unit, models in your unit have the Benefit of Cover against that attack. In addition, if your unit has the Infantry keyword, until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Stealth ability.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an Astra Militarum Infantry Regiment unit from your army (excluding Artillery and Character units) is destroyed.
stratagems.targetBody: That Infantry unit. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even though it was just destroyed.
stratagems.effectBody: Roll one D6: on a 3+, place one Cult Ambush marker anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 9" horizontally away from all enemy units (if this is not possible, no marker is placed) and add a new unit to your army identical to your destroyed unit, in Cult Ambush, at its Starting Strength, with all of its wounds remaining and any [ONE SHOT] weapons those models are equipped with considered as not having been shot.

stratagems.whenBody: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One Heretic Astartes Infantry unit from your army (excluding Damned units) that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a melee attack is allocated to your unit, after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, roll one D6 (to a maximum of six D6 per attacking unit): for each 4+, the attacking unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Movement phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One T'au Empire Battlesuit unit from your  army that is arriving using the Deep Strike ability this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Your unit can be set up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 3" horizontally away from all enemy models.
stratagems.restrictionBody: A unit targeted with this Stratagem is not eligible to declare a charge in the same turn.

stratagems.whenBody: Start of the Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: Up to two Adeptus Custodes units from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in one of your units targets an enemy unit that is below its Starting Strength, add 1 to the Wound roll.
stratagems.restrictionBody: You can only select two units if one (and only one) of them is an Anathema Psykana unit and both are within 6" of each other.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Movement phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Grey Knights Psyker unit from your army that is arriving using the Deep Strike or Teleport Assault abilities this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the start of your next Movement phase, your unit cannot be targeted by ranged attacks unless the attacking model is within 18".

stratagems.whenBody: End of the Reinforcements step of your opponent's Movement phase, if you have no Cult Ambush markers on the battlefield.
stratagems.targetBody: One Acolyte Hybrids, Hybrid Metamorphs or Neophyte Hybrids unit from your army in Cult Ambush.
stratagems.effectBody: This phase, you can set up your unit on the battlefield without using a Cult Ambush marker. When doing so, set up your unit anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 9" horizontally away from all enemy units, not within your opponent's deployment zone, and wholly within 9" of one or more battlefield edges.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Charge phase, just after an enemy unit declares a charge.
stratagems.targetBody: One Adeptus Astartes Infantry unit from your army that was selected as a target of that charge.
stratagems.effectBody: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to D6", or up to 6" instead if it is a Phobos or Scout Squad unit.
stratagems.restrictionBody: You cannot select a unit that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.

stratagems.whenBody: End of your opponent's Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: Up to two Vanguard Invader units from your army, or one Tyranids Infantry unit from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Remove the targeted units from the battlefield and place them into Strategic Reserves.
stratagems.restrictionBody: The targeted units must be more than 3" away from all enemy units.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One Goliath Rockgrinder or Goliath Truck unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One Tyranids unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 6+ ability. If your unit is within Synapse Range of your army, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability instead.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One Orks Walker or Grots Vehicle unit from your army (excluding Titanic units) that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack is allocated to a model in your unit, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One Heretic Astartes unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, your unit has the Stealth ability. In addition, if your unit is a Nurgle unit, it can only be selected as the target of a ranged attack if the attacking model is within 18".

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Movement phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Genestealer Cults Battleline unit from your army in Cult Ambush.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, when setting your unit up using a Cult Ambush marker, set your unit up anywhere on the battlefield wholly within 6" of that Cult Ambush marker and not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.targetBody: One Heretic Astartes unit from your army (excluding Damned units) that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Tyranids Monster unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [IGNORES COVER] ability, and until the end of the phase each time a model in your unit makes an attack, you can ignore any or all modifiers to that model's Ballistic Skill characteristic and any or all modifiers to the Hit roll.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Deathwatch Infantry unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons (excluding Devastating Wounds weapons) equipped by models in your unit have the [ANTI‐INFANTRY 2+] and [ANTI‐MONSTER 5+] abilities.
stratagems.restrictionBody: You cannot select any units that have already been targeted with either the Kraken Rounds or Dragonfire Rounds Stratagems this phase.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Command phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Deathwatch unit from your army.
stratagems.effectBody: Select the Furor Tactics, Malleus Tactics or Purgatus Tactics. Until the start of your next Command phase, that Deathwatch Mission Tactic is active for your unit instead of any other Deathwatch Mission Tactic that is active for your army, even if you have already selected that Deathwatch Mission Tactic this battle.

stratagems.whenBody: Start of any phase (excluding the Command phase).
stratagems.targetBody: One Adeptus Arbites, Inquisitorial Agents or Ordo Hereticus Grenades unit from your army that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
stratagems.effectBody: Select one enemy unit (excluding Monsters or Vehicles) within 8" of and visible to your unit. That enemy unit must take a Battle‐shock test and, until the end of the phase, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

stratagems.whenBody: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
stratagems.targetBody: One Adeptus Arbites, Inquisitorial Agents or Ordo Hereticus unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
stratagems.effectBody: Until the end of the phase, weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability.

stratagems.whenBody: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
